title: Linear Configuration
description: Configuration for Linear integration with spec-kit

teamId.description: UUID of the Linear team to use for issues

labels.description: Mapping of label names to their UUIDs

ai:plan.description: Label added to project when ready for planning phase

ai:tasks.description: Label added to project when plan is approved and tasks should be generated

ai:ready.description: Label added to issue when it's ready to be worked on

ai:in-progress.description: Label added by agent when actively working on an issue

ai:retry.description: Label added by agent on first failure to trigger retry

ai:blocked.description: Label added by agent when blocked and needs human intervention

ai:needs-input.description: Label added by agent when it has specific questions

ai:review.description: Label added by agent when PR is created and awaiting review

states.description: Mapping of workflow state names to their UUIDs

projectStatuses.description: Mapping of project status names to their UUIDs
